name: Mowa
tagline: We make apps, we grow minds
description: Mowa is a multidisciplinary mothership specializing in mobile app development. Their solutions use state-of-the-art technology and are created by the Mowa crew, which is formed by the most prominent and experienced talent in Brazil and the world.They strive to make the benefits of mobile technology accessible to all, creating a social impact that allows the globalization of information, ideas, knowledge, and services.
